code: import*as actionTypes from'../constants/serviceConstants';export var getServicesReducer=function getServicesReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{services:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.GET_SERVICES_REQUEST:return{loading:true,services:[]};case actionTypes.GET_SERVICES_SUCCESS:return{services:action.payload,loading:false};case actionTypes.GET_SERVICES_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var getServiceDetailsReducer=function getServiceDetailsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{service:{}};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.GET_SERVICE_DETAILS_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case actionTypes.GET_SERVICE_DETAILS_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,service:action.payload};case actionTypes.GET_SERVICE_DETAILS_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};case actionTypes.GET_SERVICE_DETAILS_RESET:return{service:{}};default:return state;}};
